campaignevents-desc: Epesaka makambo mpo na babongisi ya kampanye mpe bato oyo bakosangana na yango.
action-campaignevents-enable-registratio: ko permettre ba inscriptions ya ba événements
action-campaignevents-email-participants: ba participants ya événement ya email
right-campaignevents-email-participants: Tinda ba participants ya événement na email
action-campaignevents-view-private-parti: tala ba participants ya événement privé
right-campaignevents-view-private-partic: Tala ba participants ya événement privé
campaignevents-error-invalid-id: ID ya likambo esengeli kozala motango mobimba ya malamu.
campaignevents-error-empty-title: Tyá motó ya likambo ya lokasa ya likambo moko.
campaignevents-error-invalid-title: Motó ya likambo ya lokasa ya likambo ezali na ntina te: $1 .
campaignevents-error-invalid-title-inter: Lakisa lokasa ya likambo na wiki ya esika.
campaignevents-error-page-not-found: Ezali na page moko te ya événement oyo ezali na kombo oyo.
campaignevents-error-page-namespace-not-: Lokasa ya likambo esengeli kozala na moko ya bisika ya nkombo oyo epesami nzela
campaignevents-error-page-with-section: Lokasa ya likambo esengeli kozala na nkombo ya eteni te.
campaignevents-error-too-many-wikis: Tyá motuya monene ya {{PLURAL:$1| wiki moko| $1 wiki}}.
campaignevents-error-invalid-wikis: Ba ID ya wiki oyo elandi eyebani te: $1.
campaignevents-error-too-many-topics: Tyá motuya monene ya {{PLURAL:$1| motó ya likambo moko| $1 mitó ya makambo}}.
campaignevents-error-invalid-chat-url: Tyá URL ya kosolola oyo ezali na ntina.
campaignevents-error-trackingtool-withou: Pesa identifiant ya événement na esaleli ya suivi oyo epesami.
campaignevents-error-trackingtool-eventi: Pesa identifiant ya esaleli ya kolandela
campaignevents-error-invalid-trackingtoo: Pesa identifiant ya esaleli ya suivi ya malamu
campaignevents-error-invalid-status: Monisá soki likambo yango efungwami to ekangami.
campaignevents-error-invalid-timezone: Tyá fuseau horaire oyo ezali na ntina.
campaignevents-error-invalid-start: Ngonga ya kobanda likambo ezali ya malamu te.
campaignevents-error-start-past: Tyá ngonga ya kobanda na mikolo ezali koya.
campaignevents-error-invalid-end: Ntango ya nsuka ya likambo ezali na ntina te.
campaignevents-error-start-after-end: Tyá mokolo ya nsuka oyo eyaka nsima ya mokolo ya kobanda.
campaignevents-error-invalid-type: Tyá lolenge ya likambo oyo ezali na ntina.
campaignevents-error-invalid-dashboard-u: URL ya Dashboard oyo epesami ezali na format ya malamu te. URL esengeli kozala na format oyo: $1/[Nkombo ya Ebongiseli]/[Titre ya Programme]. Ndakisa: $1/Ebongiseli_ya_Ndakisa/Titre_ya_Eloko_ya_Ndakisa.
campaignevents-error-no-meeting-type: Pona ata lolenge moko ya likita ya likambo.
campaignevents-error-invalid-meeting-url: Tyá URL ya likita ya likambo oyo ezali na ntina.
campaignevents-error-meeting-url-not-onl: Esengeli te kolakisa URL ya likita soki likambo ezali na internet te.
campaignevents-error-countryoraddress-no: Esengeli te koyebisa mboka mpe adresi ya likita soki likambo yango esalemi na miso te.
campaignevents-error-invalid-country: Tyá nkombo ya mboka oyo ezali na ntina.
campaignevents-error-invalid-address: Tyá adresi oyo ezali na ntina.
campaignevents-error-move-eventpage-name: Lokasa oyo ya likambo ekoki te kokende libanda ya esika ya nkombo {{ns:event}} mpo ete ezali na, to ezalaki na, bokomisi likambo oyo efungolami.
campaignevents-edit-form-details-subtitl: Pesá makambo ya monene oyo etali molulu oyo ozali kobongisa
campaignevents-edit-field-page-help: Lokasa ya likambo ezali na makambo oyo etali likambo na yo. Bato bakoki kokomisa nkombo lokola baye bakosangana na lokasa ya molulu.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-hel: Bakisa kombo ya mosaleli ya ba organisateurs misusu mpo na kopesa bango ndingisa ya ko gérer événement oyo
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-cre: Oyo nde créateur ya événement, ba organisateurs misusu bakoki kolongola usager oyo te
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-use: {{GENDER:$1|mosaleli}} oyo epesami nzela te ya kobongisa makambo.
campaignevents-edit-field-wiki-type: Evenement oyo etali mingi ba wiki spécifiques?
campaignevents-edit-field-wiki-type-all: Ee (efungwami mpo na ba wiki nyonso)
campaignevents-edit-field-wikis-help: Soki likambo na yo ezali kosalema na ba wiki ya sikisiki, tosengi otanga yango awa. Yango esalisaka bato bázwa ekateli ya koyeba milulu nini basengeli kokende, mpe esalisaka mpe na makambo ya kosala analize.
campaignevents-edit-field-tracking-tools: Lien ya Dashboard ya ba programmes & événements

Ba kombo ya basaleli ya ba participants oyo bakomisami na miso ya bato ekotindama automatiquement na Dashboard. Esaleli oyo esalisaka yo olandela ba contributions ya ba participants mpe komeka impact ya événement ya campagne na yo. [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:Monoko na Ngai/Mabongisi_%26_Dashboard_ya Makambo Yekola makambo mingi].
Tyá URL ya Dashboard ya Programmes & Events mpo na événement na yo
campaignevents-edit-field-type-online-an: Evenement en ligne mpe en personne
campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url-help: Soki ozali na groupe ya chat en ligne pona ba participants ya événement oyo, okoki kobakisa lien ya invitation awa. Ba participants bakozala na makoki ya kotala lien ya invitation sima ya ko inscrire.
campaignevents-edit-field-event-is-test: Oyo ezali événement en direct to ya test?
campaignevents-edit-field-topics-help: Okoki kobakisa maximum ya {{PLURAL:$1|sujet moko|$1 sujets}}.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-intro: Pona moko ya mituna oyo elandi mpo bato oyo bakosangana báyanola ntango bazali kokomisa nkombo mpo na molulu yango.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-expla: Pona moko ya mituna oyo elandi mpo bato oyo bakosangana báyanola ntango bazali kokomisa nkombo mpo na molulu yango.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-non-p: Mituna ya sango oyo ekoki koyebana moto te (oyo ezali ya PII te).
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-pii-l: Mituna ya Basango oyo ekoki koyebana na moto (PII).
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-pii-n: Mpo na kotala biyano ya kosangisa ya ba participants oyo ezali na ba informations personnelles, bakosenga yo osimba ba informations ya participant, y compris ba informations personnelles identifiantes ya participant, oyo esangisi na tango ya inscription ya événement na bokebi.
campaignevents-edit-form-notice:
Kaka ba kombo ya basaleli nde ekozwama epai ya baye bakosangana na tango ya bokomisi nkombo. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:Monoko na Ngai/Lisalisi:Bobakisi
:CampaignEvents/Inscription Yekola makambo mingi].
campaignevents-edit-invalid-id: Pesa ID ya likambo oyo ezali na ntina.
campaignevents-edit-no-event-id: Lokasa oyo ezali na ID ya likambo ya malamu te. Tyá ID ya likambo ya malamu to tala makambo nyonso na [[Special:AllEvents|Liste ya boyokani]].
campaignevents-edit-event-notfound: Evenement moko te na ID oyo.
campaignevents-edit-page-nonlocal: Svp '''[$1 bongisa bokomisi na yo ya likambo na $2]''', wiki esika likambo yango esalemaki.
campaignevents-edit-need-central-account: Osengeli na compte central ya mosaleli mpo na ko activer to ko modifier ba enregistrements ya événement.
campaignevents-edit-organizers-not-allow: $2 {{PLURAL:$1|ezali te|ezali te}} ezali na ndingisa oyo esengeli mpo na kozala {{PLURAL:$1|mobongisi|babongisi}}
campaignevents-edit-no-organizers:
Milulu esengeli kozala na ata mobongisi moko. Svp bobakisa mobongisi moko
 to kolongola likambo yango soki ezali lisusu na ntina te.
campaignevents-edit-removed-creator:
Okoki kolongola $1 te po oyo
 {{GENDER:$1|mosaleli}} azali mokeli ya likambo
campaignevents-edit-no-creator: Esengeli omibakisa lokola mobongisi tango ozali ko activer mpo na mbala ya liboso inscription ya événement.
campaignevents-edit-organizer-need-centr: Oyo elandi {{PLURAL:$1|mosaleli asalaka|basaleli basalaka}} ezali na compte ya mosaleli ya katikati te mpe ekoki kobakisama te lokola {{PLURAL:$1|mobongisi|babongisi}}: $2.
campaignevents-edit-invalid-username: "$1" ezali nkombo ya mosaleli ya malamu te.
campaignevents-error-page-already-regist: Lokasa ya likambo oyo epesami ezali déjà na inscription associée
Okoki kosilisa mosala te mpo ete bokomisi ya likambo elongolami na lokasa ya likambo oyo.
campaignevents-edit-not-allowed-registra: Ozali na ndingisa te ya kobongisa bokomisi ya likambo oyo.
campaignevents-enable-registration-not-a: Ozali na ndingisa te ya kofungola bokomisi nkombo mpo na lokasa ya likambo oyo epesami.
registerforevent: Bokomisa nkombo mpo na molulu moko
campaignevents-register-error-no-event-i: Lokasa oyo ezali na ID ya likambo ya malamu te. Tyá ID ya likambo oyo ezali malamu to tala makambo nyonso na Liste ya Bosalisi.
campaignevents-register-error-event-not-: Evenement moko te na ID oyo.
campaignevents-register-success: Ozali sikoyo kokomisa nkombo mpo na molulu yango.
campaignevents-register-success-edit: Ba informations na yo ya inscription ezongisamaki na mikolo.
campaignevents-allevents-label-ongoing-e: Makambo oyo ezali kokoba: Makambo oyo ebandi liboso kasi ekokoba na kati ya mikolo oyo baponi
